item.title: Migrating from WordPress to Hugo
item.description: For some time now, I have wanted to set up a blog using a static site generator.

item.title: Screw it, I’ll host it myself
item.description: It’s all fun and games until someone loses an eye. Likewise, it’s all fun and games until someone loses access to their private and/or business data because they trusted it to someone else.

item.title: How to Install Plausible analytics on Ubuntu 20.10
item.description: As consumers are increasingly aware of the privacy issues on the modern web, that trend has opened up space for some interesting privacy-friendly tools to help you charge your business.
